MASTERPIECE

So I bought a Valve pack a long time ago that came with counter strike AND left 4 dead 1 & 2 a while back, it also came with all the half life games which I didn't care for. Then just this past week I decided to give half life a real chance and started playing the first title.

I AM SHOCKED that this game came out in 1998, this game has so much depth, lore, and I can see why it has such a huge following. I imagine this game was a leading force in gaming in general, I can't even think of a game that would've been this good out in 1998, amazing amazing amazing. I'll be playing the rest now.
H E L L O  G O R D A N
UN excelente juego! mas alla de que tiene varios años es entretenido de jugar! cuneta con una excelente historia que te atrapa desde un principio. 10/10

Before playing this game, I didn't understand why everyone loved Half Life so much, for me it seemed like some sort of mass nostalgia, but, one day, I finally gave in and purchased the game and, oh boy, was I wrong, I had never liked these old games from the 90s and early 2000s, I was born in 2006 so I never experienced them first hand. This was the exception, it feels so... modern, the graphics, of course, are extremely dated, yet the gameplay and, most importantly, the story, feel perfect, even for someone born 8 years after this game was released.

La verdad es que este juego fue una revolucion en la industria de los videojuegos,realmente te lo recomiendo bastante  ya que este juego es una maravilla aparte de que es una gran opcion si no tenes los recursos necesarios como para instalar, por ejemplo: Resident Evil 7.
HISTORIA
Te la resumo super rapido: llegas como cualquier dia a tu trabajo en Black Mesa para una prueba super importante pero todo se va al demonio y empienzan a salir bichos extraños de otro mundo, tenes por ejemplo al Headcrab que es una chifurimpula que se te pone en la cabeza fea que tenes y te transforma en un borracho. Al bullsquid que es una especie de toro fusionado con un pulpo. Al houndeye que seria un perro con ondas onicas de un alcanze mediano.
 Luego llegaran los militares a silenciar a cualquier cientifico que estuviese a ahi para que la verdad no salga a la luz, por lo que empiezas a matar a un monton de ellos en defensa propia, por lo que te volveras su punto principal, luego de ver que no podian contener a los alienigenas, la mayoria de militares se retirara y se olvidaran de ti, luego de pasar por muchos lugares del complejo y otros exterirores, llegaras al complejo Lambda donde tienes al planeta Xen y matar a el jefe que mantiene abierta la brecha (la intestante cerrar con un cohete pero no funciono por este hijo de put*) luego de entrar por el portal llegaras al mundo fronterizo deonde luego de matar a la madre de los Headcrabs, Gonarch o Big momma, y pasar por la factoria de Grunts donde habra Vortigaunts y Alien Controllers (que serian una especie de Nihilant mas chiquitos y mas molestos en gameplay) llegaras al portal y seras transportado a una zona totalmente oscura donde tendras ue saltar a piedras para llegar al gran portal rojo, entaras y veras a NIHILANT que es un monstruo gigantesco que tiene la apriencia de un bebe (dato: la razon de que se parezca a un bebe es porque Gabe Newell le pregunto a sus empleados que era lo mas terrorifico para ellos y dijieron que tener un bebe podia ser terrorifico y como Gabe Newell iba a tener un bebe le decidio dar esa apariencia). Luego de matarlo, te encontraras con G-man un hombre que te a estado viendo y siguiendo durante todo el juego. Te felicitara por el trabajo que hiciste te dara la opcion de trabajar con el y vivir, o rechazar y morir. Eliges trabajar con el y te pondra en estado de invernacion hasta nuevo aviso.
GAMEPLAY
El gameplay igual que su secuela son muy buenas aunque el del Half Life 1 te hace sentir estar jugando un shooter de los antes que eso no es malo.
CONCLUSION 
Half-Life es otra obra maestra en la industria de los videojuegos con gtraficos que todavia se ven muy bien hoy dia, gameplay exquisito, asombrosa ambientacion, realismo en varias cosas, y una historia compleja que aumentaria en la secuela.

One of the very few games that stood up to the titans that were Quake and DOOM, Half-Life revolutionized storytelling in games and I'm so glad it did. The way the levels just connect seamlessly together is nothing short of groundbreaking for the time. Still a blast thanks to the modified ID Tech 2 engine.

Amazing game, I would recommend this to anyone who has either played, portal, portal 2, TF2 and Left 4 dead 2, really great game. I just love it a lot, the graphics still hold up so nicely today, enjoy!

decided to play it in 2020 because it is a huge pillar of gaming culture.
knowing when this game was released, my belief that valve is always 5 years ahead of their time just got stronger.
at first I couldn't really get my ahead around the graphics but the nostalgia to counter-strike 1.6 made me wanna go through it and it was so worth it. 
bunny hopping felt great, it was quite challenging and the story was pointless at some times but in the end it was so worth it. it truly deserves the recognition it has and i can see how this totally changed gaming. i loved it.

It's not too late to join the party! Play this if you haven't!

I really liked this legendary classic game. Most of my gaming experience has been with games released around 2010, and Half Life was a well needed breath of fresh air from what I'm used to. Good mysterious story, plenty of fun weapons to use, and it actually requires a minimum of brain power for the occasional puzzle. Also, unpopular opinion, but I love first person platforming and this game had little bit of that too. If you haven't played this yet, hop on it you'll have a blast. There's also just something so satisfying about old timey games like this one...

I started up this game not knowing what to expect. Wondering if it would be as good as everyone says it is or if it was just their nostalgia speaking. Within the first 30 minutes of gameplay, I was absolutely hooked and enthralled. I played every chance I got and beat it in 15 hours. Granted, 2.5 of those hours were just waiting in menus. 

TL;DR play it even in 2020.

This was my first play through EVER of this game and it's def one of the best games I have ever played. Even though the ending was spoiled for me, I really really enjoyed this game. If your procrastinating whether to get this game or not, you should give it a shot, the beginning is a little boring but as you venture on in the story it gets really fun. I made the mistake of playing this game with HD weapons, next time I'll play without them, make sure to not play without them if you have that option. Cheers!

This was huge technical achievement admirable even to this day. It is a game the Valve learned to make games on. And it shows. And unlike other valve games, this aged very poorly and is held alive by mods.

Just unless you have something to prove, don't play this on hard.

Game broke on me completely, I have no weapons, all enemies and events got restarted and next area wont load. What a piece of ****.

+ genious enemy AI
+ masterful worlbuilding
+ Genuinly amazing interconnected "levels", they are rich, meaningfull and look like something, that could exist
+ Graphic design
+ Sound design

- Braindead friendly AI
- Shooting is **** and was hated even at the time. It is acceptable only thanks to decent sound design
- Even though your guns do almost no damage at all (8 headshots to kill a man), you are constantly swarmed by enemies
- The number of times you are forced to take damage is outright ridiculous
- Physics are and always were broken beyond belief, to the point of being considered a meme in the comunity
- Even though physics don't work well at all, huge part of the game is dependent on them and you may need to reload area, because crate you need to jump on to progress decided to climb a wall.
- When there are pickups on table or a low crate, forget about walking up to it. Hlaf of the time you will have to jump on top of it like an uncivilised ape to pick them up.
好玩

Chega ser até engraçado quando o Steam me recomenda fazer uma analise do jogo que moldou boa parte do meu amor aos jogos eletrônicos. Acho que eu tinha sei la uns 10 anos quando conhece Half-Life kkk.

Half-Life é basicamente o pai moderno dos FPS, o chamo assim porque muitos comparam FPS “antes de Half-Life” e os jogos “após half-life”
Half-Life uniu toda a base dos shooters fps da época e introduziu conceitos inovadores pra epoca, ele meio que moldou um gênero que hoje possuiu franquias bilionárias. Antes se pararmos pra analisar sobre as historias dos jogos de tiros, elas eram simples e meio que deixadas para trás enquanto uma musica de fundo rolava e inimigos apareciam pra tudo que é lado. Half-Life  imerge você em um personagem, trazendo pequenos detalhes de sí, explica onde trabalha, envolve uma trama com mistérios, faz você questionar o que diabos esta acontecendo naquele lugar, o que só ao passar de fases você vai ira descobrir aos poucos. 
Eu digo para alguns amigos que Half-Life é como se fosse 2 jogos em 1. Pois a primeira vez que você joga ela jamais será igual a segunda. Isso se deve aos quebra cabeças que aparecem para você solucionar em um determinado local para que você consiga encontrar uma saída do mesmo. Isso é muito presente na franquia, e até mesmo expandido para outros jogos da VALVe como Counter-Strike Coundition Zero Deleted Scenes e Portal.
Se você curte jogos de tiros anos 90, ficaria impressionado se nunca ouviu falar desse clássico. Jogue-o de uma chance e conheça a franquia que revolucionou o gênero. E se curtir, jogue suas duas expansões.

PS: Existem MOD’s para versões legendadas e até mesmo um Pack de Dublagem Amadora BR. 
PS²: Se você não curte gráficos clássicos, talvez iria curtir o game Black Mesa. Que é um remake feito por fans desse game.
PS³: Não darei notas sobre preços, jogabilidades, pois é meu jogo favorito de todos entao, ja pode imaginar qual nota eu daria.
Buy it.
